name: ai-social-media-platform-monorepo
description: AI-powered social media management platform - Monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:up && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate
